Name: OnePlus 7T Pro McLaren Edition
Description: OnePlus 7T Pro McLaren Edition is a gaming mobile that combines powerful performance and affordability. It features an Battery capacity of 4085, ensuring smooth multitasking and efficient computing. With 12000 MB of RAM and Internal Storage of 256 GB, Processor speed of 8, it offers quick data access and ample storage capacity. The mobile sports a vibrant 1440 resolution, delivering crisp visuals and immersive viewing experience. Very Good for gaming
